info:
Groups of words that function as adverbs (e.g., "in a hurry").
Very common. Often formed with preposition + noun (en secreto = “in secret,” con cuidado = “with care”).

Both en (“in/on”) and con (“with”) are heavily used.
native_answer: Il est parti en toute hâte.
